title: Redfin Property Scraper - Stealthy Mode
description: JSON-first Redfin scraper with lightweight HTML + Playwright fallbacks. Rotates headers/UA, retries with backoff, and supports configurable delays.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (list)
startUrls.description: List of Redfin search URLs (city/zip/neighborhood). Region ID is auto-extracted.

startUrl.title: Primary Redfin URL
startUrl.description: Single Redfin search URL (city, zip, neighborhood). Region ID is auto-extracted.

cityUrl.title: City URL (alt input)
cityUrl.description: Optional alternate field for compatibility with older configs.

regionId.title: Region ID (optional)
regionId.description: Override the region ID if auto-detection fails.

regionType.title: Region Type (advanced)
regionType.description: Override region type if auto-detection fails (city=6, zipcode=5, neighborhood=4, county=2, state=1).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Property Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each property detail page to extract complete descriptions, photos, and additional information.

preferJson.title: Prefer JSON API (fast)
preferJson.description: Use Redfin JSON API first. Turn off only if the API is blocked for your proxies.

useHtmlFallback.title: Use HTML Fallback
useHtmlFallback.description: If JSON API fails or is blocked, scrape HTML with lightweight HTTP + Cheerio.

usePlaywright.title: Enable Playwright Fallback
usePlaywright.description: Last-resort stealth browser fallback (slower, costlier). Only use when both JSON and HTML fail.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Properties to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of property listings to collect (1-1000).

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process.

pageSize.title: Page Size (API)
pageSize.description: How many homes to request per JSON API page (50-350). Higher = faster but riskier for blocks.

maxRetries.title: Max Retries per Request
maxRetries.description: Number of retries with backoff for API/HTML requests.

delayMinMs.title: Min Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayMinMs.description: Lower bound of random delay between detail requests to reduce blocks.

delayMaxMs.title: Max Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayMaxMs.description: Upper bound of random delay between detail requests to reduce blocks.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent requests (3-5 recommended to avoid blocking).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Required: Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended) to avoid blocking from Redfin.
